name: Ghost Cab
description:
WHAT IS GHOST CAB?

I made this game for a Game JAM called "A Game By It's Cover" and had a lot of fun in the process. One of JAM's obligations was to be inspired by a Famicase card from a game that doesn't exist (yet).
I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making this project. 

Be well, hugs.

CONTROLS
To control the car use your mouse.
To be insivible, and invencible, use left button from your mouse.

FAMICASE ART


CREDITS
Matt Cole Wilson - for making this amazing famicase art and saying yes for me to use it.
Eggy Toast - Misunderstood (Fase audio)
Independent Music Licensing Collective (IMLC) - hub (Menu audio)
Caio Longo - me for doing everything else like programming, concept idea, graphics and some vfx audios.
